name: Tux's Ski Vacation
description:
Gear up and hit the slopes! Join Tux and friends on an alpine adventure.

Look out for ramps and catch some air! Pull off some rad moves while you're up there, maybe even a flip or a spin!

Score extra style points by slaloming between the racing gates, but look out for trees! Try to beat your best time or just have fun.

This is an early access title, many more features are on the way!
